title: King of My Pleasure
description: Juniper is the daughter of a rich and selfish man living in the kingdom of Archonia. She has been sheltered all her life, living in near solitude on her family's estate. When Juniper's father finds himself indebted to the king, Juniper is offered to Hector as payment. Suddenly, Juniper finds herself living in King Hector's castle and her world turned upside down. But she soon discovers that being at King Hector's mercy isn't as bad as it might seem...King Hector is the most powerful man on the continent with the reputation of a rogue and the looks to match. When Juniper is brought before him, Hector wasn't prepared for what happens next. Determined to stake his claim and take what he wants, Hector decides he will never let Juniper go. Not once he realizes that she was meant to be his and not even when they are threatened to be torn apart.
author: D.M.  Holland
